page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: (CHILDREN'S PRIMARY) Two schools in the block;Newton Bluecoat C.E. and St.Marys R.C. at Lea Town.225 children attend the former;there are 3 infant and 4 junior classes(headmaster Mr.I.S.Nichol J.P).60 Chlidren attend St.Mary's;1 infant and 2 junior(headmistress Mrs. Brown) (CHILDREN'S SECONDARY)All children living in the block have to journey outside it;there are independant Grammar Schools at Kirkham(mixed), Lytham,seperate boys' and girl's,and Blackpool(mixed and girls').Kirkham Carr Hill High School and Broughton High are the comprehensives. (ADULT)Night school classes at Newton school on Wednesdays in the autumn and spring on Flower Arranging and Local History.The Lund Womens' Institute and the Lud Historical Sociey meet monthly in the Newton village hall.
